claims.claim: People should not be indefinitely judged by their past actions.
claims.quote: I understand the concept of the best the best indicator of future behaviors, past behavior, but how far do you have to go into my past to, to think of the things I did?

claims.claim: Individuals can change and contribute positively to society regardless of their past.
claims.quote: I had a realization in this last year that I've done far more good. I. I've done bad and I never thought I'd get to that point cuz I did a lot of bad. But it's, but it's not even close now.

claims.claim: Past criminal actions being public record can disproportionately affect one's life compared to those whose actions remain private.
claims.quote: the only difference between me and you is that my worst, the worst things I've ever done are documented. Most of the worst things that most people have done have just ha taken place in the dark and only they know about 'em.

claims.claim: Owning up to one's past mistakes is crucial for personal growth and societal reintegration.
claims.quote: Mine are there for public consumption and I own them.
